tool.name: SamplePiles
tool.displayname: Create Sample Piles for Tracker Rows

param.name: rowsInput
param.dialogReference:
Feature class polygon that defines the rows. Rows must be individual features within the feature class and have a unique identifier field.

Must be outlines of the tracker rows (not including panels, gearbox, or other features)

param.name: pilesPerRow
param.dialogReference: The number of piles desired for each full row. Partial rows will be based on this calculation.

param.name: pileOutput
param.dialogReference: The output point feature class delineating the piles

tool.summary:
Generates sample pile locations for tracker rows based on the input number of rows per full row.

While this tool makes representations of piles, it is not meant to be used for actual pile locations used in construction.

  • This tool is primarily made for project designs that do not have pile layout/designs and for input into the Grading Estimate tool. This tool in conjunction with the Grading Estimate tool can help inform steel estimates.

idCitation.resTitle: Create Sample Piles for Tracker Rows
